resources.string: Look at this series: 7, 10, 8, 11, 9, 12,… \nWhat number should come next?
Look at this series: 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 4, 8, …\nWhat 2 numbers should come next?
ELFA GLHA ILJA _____ MLNA \nWhat should come next ?

Here are some words translated from an artificial language. 
gorblflur means fan belt 
pixngorbl means ceiling fan 
arthtusl means tile roof 
Which word could mean ceiling tile?

Here are some words translated from an artificial language. 
agnoscrenia means poisonous spider 
delanocrenia means poisonous snake 
agnosdeery means brown spider 
Which word could mean black widow spider?

Sara lives in a large city on the East Coast.
 Her younger cousin Marlee lives in the Midwest in a small town with fewer than 1,000 residents.
Marlee has visited Sara several times during the past five years.
In the same period of time, Sara has visited Marlee only once.
Which of the following is true
Marlee likes Sara better than Sara likes Marlee.
Sara thinks small towns are boring.
Marlee wants to move to the East Coast.

All spotted Gangles have long tails. 
Short-haired Gangles always have short tails. 
Long-tailed Gangles never have short hair. 
If the first two statements are true, the third statement is

Fact 1: All chickens are birds. 
Fact 2: Some chickens are hens. 
Fact 3: Female birds lay eggs. 
If the first three statements are facts, which of the following statements must also be a fact?
None of the statements is a known fact
How many minutes is it before 12 noon, if 48 minutes ago it was twice as many minutes past 9 a.m.?

* Hint : All the questions in this app are taken from 
 1. 501 CHALLENGING LOGIC AND REASONING PROBLEMS

2. Book OF IO TESTS
